body: These are one of those douins which make me cry out of both ends
theres tears on my face? nah man thats just cum
This made me wanna cry, not cum. Now I'm sad. Please excuse me while I try to wipe this from my memory, because sadness does not look good on me
Freaking underrated

The kicker is that much of this is based on a true story. Gilles de Rais was a real man and a compatriot of Jeanne d'Arc. He committed very similar crimes and his execution and the motivations behind his being brought to the courts in the first place are accurately portrayed here. Obviously the POV character and the people surrounding him are largely fictional, but it adds to the story's weight nonetheless.
Content is disgusting, but art is epic.
Too depressing to masturbate to but good plot
Absolute masterpiece <3

this melodrama? I just want to fap shit
This gave me depression
Too little rape.... but good story 9/10
That was pretty good. Ain't even gonna lie. Came here to jerk off, but ended up getting too engrossed in the story.
Great art mostly a story based one but super hot anyways, want more sweet bois even if its just some illustrations that would give all the love

Wholesome plot, surprisingly consistent intensity, deep characterizations, and good sexy scenes. An excellent work of art and an equally tempting fapping material. What more could you ask for?! Kudos to the artist and the translator.
Really, really good. The plot more than the porn, really, but still. I just wish there was a sex scene with François.
Wow, that was fantastic

@Dufixu Onsfos Jeanne isnt the boy, Gilles is now a shotacon slave owner instead of a child serial killer and is obsessed with Jeanne D'arc. 

This is a pretty good rewrite of history though but considering the cover page has a knife and blood, Gilles probably murders the boys after a while.

Based on a true story. Can't lie, I was invested in the narrative and started reading it like a normal manga halfway through. Top tier stuff very intriguing.
Misa Ikezaki is the only mangaka from whom I'd accept snuff...simply because her(?) artwork is superb.
hooooly shit

This is actually base on the real serial child killer Gilles de Rais. Along with the poor boys being raped, it too happens in the catholic church.  You have to appreciate C95's artwork, and attention to detail they put in their works
Too much rape.... but good story 9/10

Damn I was in this exact abusive relationship where they made you feel like you’re no one, you have nothing without them, and then you’ll just do anything to please them. Granted she didn’t make me kill anyone but I feel too bad to fap to this lol. Great art and great translation though I appreciate n04h a lot

This really was a wild ride. The plot was too deep I couldn't gap (and there's a lot of text too, so that doesn't help).
It says the author took a lot of liberties while doing the doujinshi, and it shows. At least he could have kept Gilles' death as it was; hanged, not burned in the stake, but I guess is more poetic when putting it along with Jeanne's death I guess.
Too much rape, but good shit. 8.5/10
this is ART, outstanding creation

This is seriously.   ... Hooking my mine .. after reading this .. making my mind almost affected in liking handsome cute males . Almost make me think as long as beautiful .. if there is a way .. shit . I am not going to come back again..
God damn. There were only a few outstanding panels in sex scenes. But this doujin is superb in every other way possible. 9/10
I came, washed up, and came back to read the rest of the plot I give it a real 9/10
